summary: Due to rising costs, service members and their families are increasingly feeling the pinch of a competitive housing market. The Department of Defense relies on the private sector to house the majority of its service members. But it doesn't track how limited housing supply and affordability issues have affected personnel. Service members told us about challenges they face despite receiving housing allowances. For example, some...
title: Military Housing: DOD Should Address Critical Supply and Affordability Challenges for Service Members
